All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Authentication
The Authentication class provides a method to verify user authentication using credentials stored in a text file.
Book
Represents an instance of book.
Borrow
Represents an instance of book borrowing.
BorrowController
 
ConnectionController
Controller class for handling user login and transitioning to the main page.
DatabaseConnection
The DatabaseConnection class provides methods to interact with the database.
LateBorrowController
Controller class for the Late Borrow view.
Main
 
MainController
 
MainTerminal
Main class to run the application and interact with users.
Metamorph
The Metamorph class provides methods to parse XML files and create Book objects from the parsed data.
MySQLStarter
Utility class to start the MySQL and Apache services of WampServer.
NewAdherentController
 
OperationOnXMLFIle
OperationOnXMLFIle is a utility class for file operations, specifically for creating an XML file and writing API responses to it.
SearchBookAPI
SearchBookAPI is the class that access BNF's API
User
The User class represents a user in your system.
UserController
